name: Palak
greetingText: I really like your name btw, But the one which i gave you, Okay Miss Dhinchak!! haha :)
wishText: May you always remain confused, Wheather you are a Gyal or Buoy, lmfao!!
text2: U must be thinking :  Mujhe to pata hee nahi tha, huh, OVER ESMART
text3: Isliye mai pehle hee bol deta hoo - Thank u thank u, AB MAI ITNA BHEE KUCH KHASS NAHII !!
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday soon to be doctor!! You will be one of the finest, like always, blaa bluu blaa blaa..
text4: That's what I was going to do.
text6: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Do you like it?? Eagerly waiting for your reply
